page.title: 16FARMING INCL FOWLING/FISHING
page.content: FARMING IS THE PREOCCUPATION OF THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE.SOME FARMS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO PRIVATE HOMES BY MIGRANTS,RURAL/URBAN EXCHANGE"PROBLEM" {CROPS THAT HAVE BEEN GROWN THIS YEAR {WHEAT,OATS,BARLEY AND RAPE.}MANY FIELDS ARE USED FOR GRAZING AND WE COUNTED 636 COWS, 867 SHEEP,87 HORSES. {PHEASANTS ABOUND.DEER ROAM FREE.MOLES. WILDLIFE PROSPERS EVEN WITH CHEMICALS BUT HEDGES AND WOODS ARE MAINTAINED. {THERE ARE TENANT AND OWNER FARMERS. BETCHWORTH AND CHARRINGTON ESTATES ACCOUNT FOR ABOUT 30% OF THE AREA. {SUMMER CAME LATE,WET AND COLD THIS {YEAR, THE HARVEST WILL NOT BE UP TO {LAST YEARS RECORDS.}MANY RABBITS IN AREA, FARMERS GO AFTER THEM WITH JACK RUSSEL DOGS AND FERRETS WITH RADIO TRANSMITTERS ON THEIR NECKS TO TRACK THEM WHILST THEY ARE IN THE WARRENS UNDERGROUND.{HORTICULTURE ONGOING.
